title: nf-core/assesspool pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

project.errorMessage: Project name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

vcf.errorMessage: VCF file must be provided in the `vcf` column, cannot contain spaces, and must have extension '.vcf' or '.vcf.gz'

reference.errorMessage: Reference FASTA must be provided in the `referece` column, cannot contain spaces, and must have extension '.fa/fa.gz' or '.fasta/fasta.gz'

pool_sizes.errorMessage: Must provide pool size(s), either a single number or a comma-separated list
